reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

title.narrative: Sharing Lithuanian experience for the successful implementation of the EU - Ukraine Association Agreement

description.narrative: Project activities focus on technical assistance and high-level consultations of Lithuanian experts to Ukrainian institutions. During the project implementation Lithuanian long-term expert work in Ukraine and provide advice and technical assistance on the creation of efficient system of EU affairs and reform coordination and implementation of EU – Ukraine Association Agreement (including Deep and comprehensive free trade area (DCFTA)) and necessary economic reforms. According to the needs from the Ukrainian side, short time experts sent to provide consultations for the Ukrainian Government bodies and ministries in various specified areas (energy, health, state-owned enterprise reforms).

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
